text: Arau e'idarae ami manara arau jbinara majara paraa cayatanasakalaka pratyeka nabira satrau bana'icho, prataranara uddesye sihamte ijane sijanaka camakaprada bakyara kumantrana diye. Tomara pratipalake iccha karaile sihamte e'ibora nakarailehemtena, gatike tumi sihamtaka arau sihamtara micha ratanaka paraityaga karaa
